title: How to disable sensors which I don't need on an Apple iPhone - Quora

response.answer_text: You can’t. Quora hates short answers like this so here is the fluff section. I hope you are having a nice day. Thank you for asking me to answer this question. But I wonder what makes you think you need to turn off sensors on the iPhone. Do you think you’re saving battery life? No one is more concerned about battery life than Apple and they’ve spent millions making sure these sensors run on very little power so you don’t have to worry about it. Are you worried that these sensors are spying on you? If so, all you need to do is put on a tin foil hat and that ought to take care of it.
